naslov: Kuća prvi red do mora Prvić Luka (prodaja)
opis: Na prodaju je kuća prvi red do mora, u Prvić Luci na čarobnom otoku Prviću. Kuća se sastoji od tri etaže povezane unutarnjim stubištem. U prizemlju se nalazi dnevni boravak, kuhinja i kupaonica, na prvom katu jedna spavaća soba, a na drugom još jedna, prostranija soba koja ima pogled na kristalno plavo more i otočiće rasute po horizontu. Kroz cijelu kuću proteže se stubište, a između prvog i drugog kata nalazi se veliki ugradbeni ormar koji nudi praktičan prostor za odlaganje. Kuća je prije nekoliko godina renovirana – ugrađene su nove betonske ploče između katova, zamijenjene elektroinstalacije, izrađeno novo stubište, postavljen novi krov i uređena kupaonica. Prvić Luka je mjesto koje zadržava autentičnost i mir malog dalmatinskog otoka – bez automobila, bez buke, s uskim kamenim ulicama, starim čempresima i ritmom života koji vraća ono najbitnije. Ova kuća, na ovoj lokaciji, prava je prilika za one koji traže mir, ljepotu i život uz more u svom najiskrenijem obliku. A house for sale just steps from the sea, located in Prvić Luka on the enchanting island of Prvić. The house spreads over three floors connected by an internal staircase. The ground floor features a living room, kitchen, and bathroom. On the first floor, there is one bedroom, while the top floor offers a more spacious bedroom with a breathtaking view of the crystal-clear sea and small islands scattered across the horizon. A staircase runs through the entire house, and between the first and second floor, a large built-in wardrobe provides practical storage space. The house was renovated a few years ago – new reinforced concrete slabs were installed between floors, electrical installations were replaced, a new staircase was built, the roof was renewed, and the bathroom was updated. Prvić Luka is a place that preserves the authenticity and peacefulness of a small Dalmatian island – no cars, no noise, just narrow stone streets, tall cypress trees, and a pace of life that reminds you of what truly matters. This house, in such a rare and privileged location, is a true opportunity for those seeking peace, beauty, and a life by the sea in its most genuine form. For more information or to arrange a viewing, feel free to get in touch.
